name: The S.S.O.W.A.R.C.A Presents Rat Trap
description:
you are a rat trapped in a lab maze. you need to find a way to escape before the timer runs out. use mutations to find the way forward or optional secrets. can you lead Remy jones to the victory cheese of will the rat go ka splat.

controls

W.A.S.D - move rat

Mouse -  move camera left and right

Space Bar - use chameleon tongue (unlocked when you get the ability)  

Move Into Boxes - push boxes (unlocked when you get the ability)  

P - pause game

Secret Code - Riddle just above space it has no money 3 spots below the 6 and it makes honey
